Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長
Entry.EnglishText: Manager

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナ
Entry.EnglishText: Serena

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場
Entry.EnglishText: Steelworks Factory

Entry.JapaneseText: これは……まさか!?
Entry.EnglishText: This...this is impossible!

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスが暴走してる!!
Entry.EnglishText: This is the work of Force, alright!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>樹のフォルス<White>だ！
Entry.EnglishText: It's the <Yellow>Force of Forest<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなのがあるのか？
Entry.EnglishText: There's a Force like that?

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前、見た事がある。 植物を自由に操る事のできる フォルスだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, I've seen it before. It allows the bearer to manipulate plant life at their own free will.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>の能力者か!?
Entry.EnglishText: Could it be a member of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく状況を探るんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: There's only one way to find out!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>……!! 本当にすまん!! 娘が可愛いあまりに、セレーナを…… 許してくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>! I'm so sorry! I was so focused on getting my daughter back, that Serena... Forgive me...

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、まあ……おれもあんな風に 暴れちまったしな…… それに終わった事をウダウダ言うのは おれの性分に合わないぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: No, it's... I ended up causing a lot of trouble too. Besides, moaning and groaning about something that already happened isn't my thing.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが……だが、セレーナは さらわれて……
Entry.EnglishText: But... But, Serena was still...

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴はおれが助けに行って来る。 この仲間と一緒にな。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm going to bring her back. With my new buddies right here!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……本当にすまない…… 私がふがいないばっかりに……
Entry.EnglishText: That so? I'm really sorry, again. I'm nothin' but a weakling...

Entry.JapaneseText: 気をつけてな…… いや、言うまでもないか…… あんな力を持っているんだからな。
Entry.EnglishText: Take care, will ya? Well, I guess I don't even need to say that. With a power like yours, an' all.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……すまないな、黙ってて。 こいつで連中ぶっ飛ばして、 すぐに姉貴を連れて帰って来るさ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Sorry for hiding it from you. I'm gonna give those guys hell then bring my big sister back here with me!

Entry.JapaneseText: 少し仕事を休むけど、 戻ってきた時は また働かせてくれよな。
Entry.EnglishText: I've gotta play hooky for awhile, but let me work for you again when I come back, yeah?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、もちろんだとも。 二人が帰って来るのを待っているよ。 それじゃあ……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, of course! I'll be waitin' for the both of ya. Well then...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……出発しよう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Let's head out.

Entry.JapaneseText: ところで、姉貴をさらってった 連中は、どこへ向かったか、 わかってんのか？
Entry.EnglishText: By the way, do you know where those guys who took my sister are going?

Entry.JapaneseText: おそらくサニイタウンだろう。 あそこからなら、集められた娘たちを 船で首都バルカへ運べる。
Entry.EnglishText: Sunny Town, in all likelihood. From there, they would be able to take the kidnapped girls to Balka via ship.

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン？
Entry.EnglishText: Sunny Town...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 水上にある キレイな街だヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: It's a really pretty town built on top of the water!

Entry.JapaneseText: 水の上に街が……？
Entry.EnglishText: A town built on water...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、行ってみれば わかるって。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, you'll understand when you see it.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街から東南へ下ったところに トヨホウス河がある。 サニイタウンに行くなら そこを舟で下れば、歩くより早いぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Southeast of this town is a river called Toyohose. If you want to get to Sunny Town, travel by river would be faster than walking.

Entry.JapaneseText: 東南か…… よし、トヨホウス河へ向かおう。
Entry.EnglishText: Southeast, was it? Alright, let's head for the Toyohose River.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3404>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3404> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3410>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3410> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>を頼む……！
Entry.EnglishText: Take care of <Tytree>...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があったんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What happened here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 兵隊らしき連中が あっと言う間に街を占拠して…… それで、ヒューマの娘たちを工場に 連れていって、中に閉じ込めたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: A bunch of guys who look like soldiers suddenly took over the city... They've locked themselves in the factory with every single Huma girl who lives here.

Entry.JapaneseText: きっとサレたちだよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: It's gotta be Saleh and the others!

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ全員、中に 閉じ込められているのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is everyone still trapped inside?

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長と<Tytree>が話し合いに行って 何人かの娘たちは解放されたんだけど、 その二人と、<Tytree>の姉セレーナが まだ戻って来ていないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The boss and <Tytree> went inside to negotiate and some of the girls were released, but neither of them along with Selena, <Tytree>'s older sister, have come out.

Entry.JapaneseText: その<Tytree>というのは？
Entry.EnglishText: Who's <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場で働いていた青年だ。
Entry.EnglishText: One of the younger factory workers.

Entry.JapaneseText: た、助けてくれぇー!!
Entry.EnglishText: H-help meeeee!

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長!!
Entry.EnglishText: Boss!

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫ですか!?
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all right!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>が！ セレーナを、あの連中に、 工場が森に……！
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>! Serena...Those guys... ...Factory...A jungle...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 落ち着いて！ ゆっくり話してください！
Entry.EnglishText: Calm down! You're not making any sense!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、うちの娘が…… いや、<Tytree>が…… うわぁぁ……っ！
Entry.EnglishText: But...my daughter! And <Tytree> is... Aaaaagh!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……落ち着きましたか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Did that help you calm down?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あ、ああ、ああ、なんとか……
Entry.EnglishText: *Pant*, *Pant*... Y-yeah...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があったのか 話してください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please explain the situation to us.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……いや、その…… 兵隊を連れて来た 妙な二人組がいてな……
Entry.EnglishText: W-well, you see... There were these two shady lookin' guys with the soldiers...

Entry.JapaneseText: で、そいつらがセレーナを 連れて行こうとしてたのさ。 ヒューマの中で一番キレイな 娘だとか言って……
Entry.EnglishText: They took Selena away, talkin' about how she was the most beautiful Huma girl in the city...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱりサレたちみたいだね。
Entry.EnglishText: It must be Saleh and the others after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: そしたら突然、工場の床から 木のツタが伸びて来て、 奴らからセレーナを 取り戻そうとして……
Entry.EnglishText: We tried takin' Serena back, but then sharp vines started growin' outta the floor!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Tytree>が 何かしてるらしい事は わかったが……
Entry.EnglishText: I coulda sworn it was <Tytree> makin' it happen, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 連中がそれを全部なぎ払ったら、 後はヤケを起こしたみたいに 次々とツタや樹が生えて来て、 私は命からがら……
Entry.EnglishText: When we started try'na cut through the plants, more vines and even trees started burstin' out! I nearly died!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……やはり、フォルスが 暴走したんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: It sounds like he's lost control of his Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: で、サレたちはどこ？
Entry.EnglishText: Where is Saleh now?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここだよ、ぼうや。
Entry.EnglishText: Right here, runt.

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ、トーマ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh! Tohma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ウソは困りますよ、工場長。 あなたの大事な娘さんを連れていかない 代わりに、セレーナさんを引き渡すという 約束をしたじゃないですか？
Entry.EnglishText: You're a naughty little liar, Foreman. If I remember correctly, it was you who made a deal to hand over Miss Selena in exchange for your precious daughter, was it not?

Entry.JapaneseText: もっとも、あなたの娘さんを 連れていくつもりなんて、 はなからなかったけど。
Entry.EnglishText: Not that we ever had any intentions of taking your daughter in the first place.

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜなら、あなたの娘さんは 美しくないから。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's be honest, she's not exactly beautiful.

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴様ら、クレアはどこだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: You bastard! Where is Claire!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 見ての通りだ。 ここにはいない。
Entry.EnglishText: As you can see, not here.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこへやったんだ!? クレアを……クレアを返せ！
Entry.EnglishText: Where have you taken her!? Claire... Give her back now!

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪いけど、おしゃべりしてる ヒマはないんだよね。
Entry.EnglishText: My apologies, but we have no time to make small talk.

Entry.JapaneseText: 待て!! おまえたちの目的は何だ!? それは女王陛下のご存念なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Wait! Why are you doing this!? Is this really Her Majesty's command!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああっ、前に進めないヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Agh, we can't go forward!

Entry.JapaneseText: お願いです!! 私にかまわず、弟を…… <Tytree>を止めてください!!
Entry.EnglishText: Please, don't worry about me! Just stop my brother!

Entry.JapaneseText: このままだと、街の人たちが <Tytree>のあの変な力に 巻き込まれてしまいます!!
Entry.EnglishText: At this rate, <Tytree> will destroy the entire city with his strange power.

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクからもお願いするよ。 この美しいお姉さんを 悲しませないようにね。
Entry.EnglishText: I ask that of you myself. I would hate to put a dampener on such a pretty face.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……逃がさん……!!
Entry.EnglishText: ...Get back here!

Entry.JapaneseText: 待て、<Veigue>。 このフォルスの暴走を 止めるのが先だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, <Veigue>! Stopping this rampaging Force is our priority right now!

Entry.JapaneseText: 連中を追いたい気持ちはわかる。 しかし、目の前のこの状況を おまえは放って行くのか？
Entry.EnglishText: I understand you want to pursue them, but do you really have the heart to just abandon this situation?

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし……！
Entry.EnglishText: But...!

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナさんは自分が 連れ去られようとしているのに、 この街と弟の事を案じ、俺たちに託した。
Entry.EnglishText: Selena has entrusted us with the safety of this city and her brother, even at the cost of her freedom.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……スールズでの クレアさんに似てるね……
Entry.EnglishText: It's just like what Claire did in Sulz...

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスを……
Entry.EnglishText: Force...

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスを止めに行こう……
Entry.EnglishText: We have to stop this Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……それから、 <Tytree>も助けないとネ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...And save <Tytree> while we're at it!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
